column1: Toktar Aubakirov was born on July 27, 1946 in Karkaraly region, Karagandinskaya Oblast, Kazakh SSR, which is now Kazakhstan.

column2: In 1965 he joined the Armavir Military Aviation Institute of the Anti-Air Defence Pilots.

column1: During 1976-1991 years - he served as a test pilot at the Mikoyan Experimental Design Bureau (MiG aircraft).

column2: During this time he tested over 50 types of aircraft.

column1: In 1991, in accordance with an agreement between the governments of the USSR and the Kazakh SSR, started training at the Gagarin Cosmonaut Training Centern.
Since 1993, he has been the general director of the National Aerospace Agency of Republic of Kazakhstan.
He was a member of the Kazakhstan parliament.

column2: Now he is a pensioner and consultant.

column1: Toktar Aubakirov is married to Tatyana Aubakirova.
